headline: EDWARDS ROTARY MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 6.7 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump    Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor. Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:

Model E2M8

Ultimate Pressure 1.00E-3(En) torr (1.33E-3 mbar)

Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
